text: Andrea Joy Campbell (born June 11, 1982) is an American lawyer and Democratic Party politician. She has been the attorney general of Massachusetts since 2023. Campbell is a former member of the Boston City Council, serving from 2016 to 2022. She served as president of the council from January 2018 until January 2020. Campbell unsuccessfully ran for mayor of Boston in 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== * Government website * Campaign website * Past (Boston City Council) webpage * Category:1982 births Category:Lawyers from Boston Category:Living people Category:Massachusetts attorneys general Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Andrea Campbell
